subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etyl}}
{{liushu|p}} – a man or figure with an ugly face and tail.

Compare {{zh-l|*異|different, strange}}, where the {{zh-l|*田}} also derives from a face.

It may not be clear from the character, but the lower right “dot” is a small {{zh-l|*厶}}; it is a residual tail – compare {{zh-l|*离}}.

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: {{unk|zh}}. May be related to {{och-l|威|to overawe, to terrorise}} with ''k''-nominalisation and endoactive tone B, ''lit.'' "the thing which is doing the overawing", or related to {{och-l|歸|to return}}. See also {{och-l|詭|to deceive; peculiar}}.

subSections.title: Compounds
Etymology
subSections.text:
[[File:Oni2WP.jpg|thumb|250px|{{lang|ja|鬼}} (''oni''): two '''[[demon]]-[[ogre]]s'''.]]
{{ja-kanjitab|おに|yomi=k}} Thought to be derived from {{m|ja|隠|tr=on||to hide; hidden from sight}}.{{R:Daijirin}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|おに}}

# [[ghost]]
# [[evil]] [[spirit]], [[demon]], [[ogre]]
#* {{RQ:Wamyō Ruijushō|1|32}}<ref>{{R:Wamyō Ruijushō}}</ref>
#*: 人神 周易云、人神曰鬼、居偉反、和名'''於邇'''、或説云、'''於邇'''者、隠音之訛也、鬼物隠而不欲顯形、故以稱也。
# {{lb|ja|sort=おに|metaphor}} someone of remarkable or diabolical [[energy]] or [[ability]], a [[demon]]
#: {{ja-usex|彼女は仕事の'''鬼'''だ。|かのじょ は しごと の '''おに''' だ。|She is a '''demon''' for work.}}
# "[[it]]" in a game of [[tag]]/[[hide and seek]] ({{m|ja|鬼ごっこ}} ''onigokko'', "pretend spirits")
